article_text: The campaigns fell along similar themes, with Republican incumbents claiming to have improved the state’s business climate and education spending and Democrats arguing Republican policies have favored the wealthy and hurt education in the state. Who was the most convincing should be evident after the final count Tuesday. But there are five other big questions we hope will get answered as well.

article_metadata.title: 5 questions Election Day will answer | News & Observer

article_summary:
But there are five other big questions we hope will get answered as well.
The campaigns fell along similar themes, with Republican incumbents claiming to have improved the state’s business climate and education spending and Democrats arguing Republican policies have favored the wealthy and hurt education in the state.
Who was the most convincing should be evident after the final count Tuesday.
